content:
To actively listen, focus on the speaker and pay attention to what they are saying. Avoid interrupting and try to paraphrase or summarize what they said to show understanding. Active listening can improve communication and build trust in relationships.

Example:

Speaker: "I've been feeling overwhelmed with work. I have so many deadlines and I'm struggling to keep up."

Listener: "I can understand how that would be stressful. It sounds like you have a lot going on right now. Have you considered asking for help or delegating tasks?"
